name: FNF Pico Stress Remix Test
description:
It's Pico  from Week "3" Week "7" from Friday Night Funkin' Pico Speaker Stress Remix! Go crazy with his beeps and bops! Credits do really go to BrightFyre for making the Friday Night Funkin' Pico Speaker Stress Remix mod! Play on the web here on a PC/Mobile devices! If you want, if you have a windows computer, you can also download it with the download button below!

Controls: 

To switch to touch control, touch the toggle in game.

Arrow keys to play the sounds (For mobile press D-pad button)

Hold Space (A Button for Mobile) and Arrow Keys (D-pad buttons) for secondary sound   

Secret Key = ??? ;)

Hold any of the buttons to hold a pose!

Check out the Friday Night Funkin here: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Also check out Friday Night Funkin on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371
